divs: sighting detailsi was walking home early eve on 7\25\2012 about 6:30 pm in central ohio, when i spotted something silver & shinny to the left of me (the northern sky view). at first glance i thought it to be a plane, but there was no sound & it just hovered. there was an plane that was in the west flying south & the object did not share any characteristics of any aircraft i've ever seen. curious i stopped walking & watched it (trying not to blink, lol) & it seemed to just float, no movement that i could see. after about 5 minutes of observation & skepticism i felt that i could not "explain" &\or define what the object was. i watched it for another 2 minutes, then it flickered and was gone... so my question is did anyone else see this in or around ohio on wednesday july 25th 2012??? sorry i don't have any pix or vids, it was daylight & i tried to get a pic but the object didn't show up on my cell cam.
trends: There have been 14 other sightings in Mansfield
There were no other sightings in Mansfield on or around July 25th 2012
